scripts.init-proj: npm run init-submodule && npm run init-npm && npm run all-to-master
scripts.init-submodule: git submodule init && git submodule update
scripts.init-npm: npm install && cd ./cbkzxt-ar-basic && npm install && cd ../cbkzxt-ar-scenes && npm install && cd ../cbkzxt-ar-pwa && npm install
scripts.all-to-master: cd ./cbkzxt-ar-basic && git checkout master && cd ../cbkzxt-ar-scenes && git checkout master && cd ../cbkzxt-ar-pwa && git checkout master
scripts.build: npm run build-basic && npm run build-scenes && npm run build-pwa
